item.title: Diana add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Diana add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The lover of nature is he whose inward and outward senses are still truly adjusted to each other; who has retained the spirit of infancy even into the era of manhood. His intercourse with heaven and earth, becomes part of his daily food. In the presence of nature, a wild delight runs through the man, in spite of real sorrows..." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Diana add a quote by Enos A. Mills
item.description: "The forests are the flags of nature. They appeal to all and awaken inspiring universal feelings. Enter the forest and the boundaries of nations are forgotten. It may be that some time an immortal pine will be the flag of a united peaceful world." -- Enos A. Mills

item.title: Diana add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all." -- Helen Keller
